matrix-project.description:
Build squawk in several configurations, with FLASH_MEMORY=FALSE:
  • ASSERTIONS_ENABLED
  • DEBUG_CODE_ENABLED
  • ENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING
  • TRACING_ENABLED
  • FLOATS

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.6.0/jre/lib/i386/client:/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.6.0/jre/lib/i386:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH cd trunk java -jar build.jar clean java -jar build.jar copyphoneme java -jar build.jar -DTRACING_ENABLED=$TRACING_ENABLED -DASSERTIONS_ENABLED=$ASSERTIONS_ENABLED -DDEBUG_CODE_ENABLED=$DEBUG_CODE_ENABLED -DENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING=$ENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING && java -jar build.jar -DTRACING_ENABLED=$TRACING_ENABLED -DASSERTIONS_ENABLED=$ASSERTIONS_ENABLED -DDEBUG_CODE_ENABLED=$DEBUG_CODE_ENABLED -DENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING=$ENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING -prod -mac -o2 rom -metadata cldc imp debugger $HUDSON_HOME/bin/runsmoketest.sh DELEGATING
java -jar build.jar map -cp:cldc/j2meclasses:imp/j2meclasses:debugger/j2meclasses squawk.suite rm squawk.suite.map
ls -l > sizereport.txt java -jar build.jar clean
